trans-unit.source: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item de legenda, que é armazenado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItem class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points.
trans-unit.target: A classe LegendItem representa um item de legenda, que pode ser um padrão ou o item personalizado:-itens de legenda padrão são inseridos automaticamente a legenda da série de dados ou pontos de dados.

trans-unit.source: Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series.
trans-unit.target: As entradas padrão para gráficos de pizza e rosca representam os pontos de dados plotados, enquanto as entradas para todos os outros tipos de gráfico representam a série plotada.

trans-unit.source: By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essas entradas de legenda usam a cor de ponto ou série de dados para a cor de símbolo e o nome do ponto de dados ou de série para o texto do item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Itens de legenda padrão podem ser personalizados ou excluídos no tempo de execução usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: - Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: -Itens de legenda personalizado tem texto definido pelo usuário, cor de símbolo e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário das entradas padrão, eles não estão conectados com os dados plotados.

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: Itens de legenda personalizados podem ser adicionados no tempo de design ou em tempo de execução, usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting of a LegendItem object.
trans-unit.target: Símbolos de legenda podem ser retângulos, linhas ou marcadores, dependendo do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>configuração da propriedade de um legenditem.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of a custom legend item is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O texto de um item de legenda personalizado é determinado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> collection property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: Observe que você também pode adicionar itens de legenda personalizado usando o `Add` e `Insert` métodos associados a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>propriedade de coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class with the specified name, color and image path.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> classe com o caminho especificado do nome, cor e imagem.

trans-unit.source: Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified.
trans-unit.target: Somente o `image` ou `color` parâmetro precisa ser especificado.

trans-unit.source: If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos forem especificados, o `image` parâmetro tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: The name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: O nome do item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: The color of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A cor do item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da imagem a ser exibida para o item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a orientação do gradiente do plano de fundo de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: Também determina se um gradiente é usado.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade BackGradientStyle para determinar se um título exibirá um gradiente e é usado determinar a orientação do gradiente se houver um.

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é implementada somente se a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de padrões disponíveis, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Para usar cores de gradiente:-usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>propriedade para definir a cor primária.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the BackGradientStyle property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -Use a propriedade BackGradientStyle para definir a cor secundária.

trans-unit.source: - Use this BackGradientStyle property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Use essa propriedade BackGradientStyle para definir o estilo de gradiente desejado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de hachura de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>enumeração Especifica o padrão de hachura usado por um pincel de tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: O padrão de hachura consiste em uma cor de plano de fundo sólida e as linhas desenhadas no plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de estilos de hachurado disponíveis, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A cor das linhas de hachura é determinada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cor que será substituída por uma cor transparente quando a imagem de plano de fundo é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valor que será exibido como transparente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor secundária de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackSecondaryColor é uma das várias propriedades relacionadas que determinam a cor de plano de fundo secundária de muitos <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objetos; ele é usado quando as cores de gradiente estão sendo aplicadas.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é implementada somente se a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir BackSecondaryColor para qualquer valor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Se a hachura for usada, a propriedade BackSecondaryColor determina a cor das linhas de hachura do item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Para usar cores de gradiente do plano de fundo de uma célula legenda: usar cores de gradiente:-usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>propriedade para definir a cor primária.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>propriedade para definir a cor secundária.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>propriedade para definir o estilo de gradiente desejado.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valor usado para a cor secundária do plano de fundo com preenchimento de gradiente ou hachura.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da borda de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir essa propriedade para qualquer valor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use a marker for a custom legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você usar um marcador para um item de legenda personalizado.

trans-unit.source: this property will set the border color of the marker.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade definirá a cor da borda do marcador.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> property is also set, its value has precedence.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A>propriedade também for definida, seu valor tem precedência.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da borda de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the line style used for a border.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade determina o estilo de linha usado para uma borda.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: A linha pode ser sólida, pontilhada e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Para outros estilos de borda, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>tópico de enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> valor de enumeração que determina o estilo de borda do item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da borda de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The BorderWidth property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BorderWidth também pode ser usada para definir a largura das linhas quando, por exemplo, os itens de legenda personalizado são exibidos com um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>estilo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An<xref uid="langword_csharp_ integer" name=" integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the width, in pixels, of the legend item border.
trans-unit.target: Um<xref uid="langword_csharp_ integer" name=" integer" href=""> </xref> valor que determina a largura, em pixels, da borda de item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de células no item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: A legend item consists of one or more legend cells, each represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object and stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Um item de legenda consiste em uma ou mais células de legenda, cada um representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objeto e armazenados em <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica a todo o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: This Color property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de cor é que um várias propriedades que obtém ou definir a cor de vários elementos do gráfico; relacionadas ao ele pode ser definido como qualquer valor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for definida para um ponto de dados e sua série, a cor do ponto de dados terá precedência.

trans-unit.source: The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color.
trans-unit.target: A cor da série será usada apenas para pontos de dados que não pode definir suas próprias cores.

trans-unit.source: If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color.
trans-unit.target: Se um item de legenda personalizado usa um marcador, essa propriedade determina a cor do marcador.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property is set, its value then has precedence.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>for definida, seu valor de propriedade e tem precedência.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property will be ignored if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A> property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade será ignorada se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A>propriedade especifica uma imagem a ser usado para o símbolo de item de legenda.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> classe e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend item is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um sinalizador que indica se o item de legenda está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade se aplica a todo o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend item is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item de legenda estiver habilitado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem que será exibida para um símbolo de item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the image file to be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> symbol.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade determina o arquivo de imagem a ser usado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>símbolo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: The path can be an absolute or a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: O caminho pode ser um absoluto ou uma URL relativa.

trans-unit.source: If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir uma imagem de plano de fundo, essa imagem será exibida independentemente do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>configuração de propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>propriedade para habilitar uma cor usada pela imagem apareçam transparentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a URL de um arquivo de imagem.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de exibição da imagem de item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Esses estilos determinam como o símbolo correspondente do item será exibido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style can be combined with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>estilo pode ser combinado com um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>estilo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, first set the ImageStyle property to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, primeiro defina a propriedade de ImageStyle para <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> property to specify a marker image, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to specify a marker style.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A>propriedade para especificar uma imagem do marcador, ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>propriedade para especificar um estilo de marcador.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker.
trans-unit.target: O símbolo resultante será uma combinação de uma linha e uma imagem ou um marcador.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object associated with this legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objeto associado a este item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the map area attributes of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o mapa de atributos da área de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the attributes of corresponding map area for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa os atributos da área do mapa correspondente para o item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da borda dos marcadores, se usado.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar marcadores, defina a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>propriedade com um valor diferente de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: Observe que os marcadores não serão aplicados pizza, rosca e qualquer empilhadas tipos de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: For custom legends, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property will also set the border color of markers.
trans-unit.target: As legendas personalizado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>propriedade também definirá a cor da borda dos marcadores.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MarkerBorderColor property setting has precedence over the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: A configuração da propriedade MarkerBorderColor tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>configuração de propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valor que representa a cor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul) de uma borda do marcador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da borda dos marcadores, se usado.

trans-unit.source: Measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Medida em pixels.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1) pixel.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o pixel um (1).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor dos marcadores, se usado.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a marker image.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma imagem do marcador.

trans-unit.source: Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Representa um caminho para um arquivo de imagem, que pode ser uma URL absoluta ou relativa.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar marcadores, defina a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>propriedade com um valor diferente de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MarkerImage property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MarkerImage tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Uma imagem do marcador pode ser qualquer arquivo de gráficos válido com suporte pelo .NET Framework, incluindo ícones.

trans-unit.source: To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir uma cor da imagem do marcador para ser transparente, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a URL de um arquivo de imagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cor que será substituída por uma cor transparente quando a imagem do marcador é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: The MarkerImageTransparentColor property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MarkerImageTransparentColor é usada para selecionar uma cor em uma imagem do marcador que será exibida como transparente.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir essa propriedade para qualquer valor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valor que representa uma cor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da legenda marcadores de item, se usado.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar marcadores, defina a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>propriedade com um valor diferente de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: Observe que os marcadores não serão aplicados a pontos de dados de pizza, rosca e quaisquer tipos de gráfico empilhado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> expressão que representa a altura e largura da área de plotagem de marcadores, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 5 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um estilo de marcador de item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.
trans-unit.target: Também é usado para ativar ou desativar a exibição de marcadores.

trans-unit.source: To disable markers, set this property to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para desativar marcadores, defina essa propriedade como <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A MarkerStyle integer enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de inteiros MarkerStyle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o nome do item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de postback que pode ser processado em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the postback value passed to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o valor de postback passado para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor do separador de item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade se aplica a todo o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valor usado para desenhar a cor do separador de item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do separador de item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> associado a um item de legenda padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só deve ser usada no <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento para determinar quais séries de dados representa uma entrada de legenda padrão.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The SeriesName property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SeriesName se aplica a todos os gráficos, exceto no caso de gráficos de pizza e esfera; seus itens de legenda padrão correspondem plotados pontos de dados e não plotados série.

trans-unit.source: When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Ao lidar com gráficos de pizza e esfera, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>propriedade em vez disso.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não deve ser definida pelo desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica a todo o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que determina o nome da série associada a um item de legenda padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"> </xref> objeto associado a um item de legenda padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só deve ser usada no <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento para determinar a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>objeto que é representado pela entrada de legenda do gráfico padrão pizza ou esfera.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de gráfico diferente de pizza ou gráficos esfera retornará um resultado negativo um (-1), porque os itens de legenda padrão correspondem aos plotado série e não plotado pontos de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> property for these chart types.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A>propriedade para esses tipos de gráfico.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não deve ser definida pelo desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica a todo o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o local da legenda padrão associada do ponto de dados em um índice com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: Todos os tipos com exceção de pizza de gráficos e gráficos de rosca retornará um resultado negativo um (-1).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da sombra de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da sombra de vários elementos do gráfico e pode ser definida como qualquer valor ARGB (alfa, vermelho, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: O valor alfa pode ser usado para obter um efeito de sombreamento "real"; Tente usar uma cor de "128,0,0,0" de sombras.

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Para implementar uma sombra, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A>propriedade para um valor diferente de zero (0).</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o deslocamento de sombra, em pixels, de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Para implementar o sombreamento, use um valor diferente de zero (0).

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor positivo resulta em uma sombra que muda para baixo e para a direita.

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: Um valor negativo resulta em uma sombra que muda para cima e para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** essa propriedade é aplicável somente a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>objetos com uma <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>das <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o deslocamento de sombra, em pixels, do elemento do gráfico relevantes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a dica de ferramenta do item da legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a dica de ferramenta para o item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the destination URL of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a URL de destino de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the destination URL of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a URL de destino de um item de legenda.

trans-unit.source: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".
trans-unit.target: Para usar uma URL absoluta, inicie a expressão de cadeia de caracteres com "http://" ou "www".

trans-unit.source: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Se a cadeia de caracteres não começa com um destes prefixos, ele será tratado como uma URL relativa.
